info.name: Multipass Pendulum Attractor
info.description:
Multipass Runge-Kutta(4) simulation of the chaotic double pendulum attractor.
This generalizes [1] to different masses/lengths.
See instructions in Image shader.
[1] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Double_pendulum#/media/File:Double_pendulum_flips_graph.png

void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
{
    vec2 uv = fragCoord/iResolution.xy;
    
    if(iFrame == 0 || texelFetch( iChannel1, ivec2(40,1),0 ).x != 0.)
        fragColor = abs(texture(iChannel0,uv));
    else
        fragColor = max(abs(texture(iChannel0,uv)), abs(texture(iChannel1,uv)));
}
